comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Penelope Parsons Maddy, elsewhere on Flickr: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/societyforscience/4977586858/] She went to Point Loma High School, earned a PhD from Princeton, and became a philosophy professor at UC-Irvine: www.lps.uci.edu/lps_bios/pjmaddy www.lib.uci.edu/about/publications/philosophy/maddy.html An interview with Penelope Maddy: www.phil-math.org/Interviews/maddy.html Nice article about her in Scientific American: www.scientificamerican.com/article.cfm?id=penelope-maddy-...
